document.discussion_title: Broncos fans weigh in on QB controversy
document.topic_text: Broncos fans weigh in on quarterback controversy 9NEWS at 10 p.m. 08/11/16. Allison Sylte, KUSA 10:43 CONNECT KUSA - Thursday night’s preseason game answered a few questions for Denver Broncos fans. Most of the talk since the Super Bowl has been about the quarterback position – namely, the competition between Mark Sanchez and Trevor Siemian for the starting job. 9NEWS Reporter Noel Brennan talked with a few fans watching the game to get their impressions. See what they thought in the video above!
